text: 1:10 Jon 15:16; Efesus 2:10; 4:1; Filipai 1:27; 1 Tesalonika 4:1; Hibru 13:21Kamaghɨn amizɨ ia Ekiamɨn gumazamizibar mɨn ikɨva an arazibar amutɨma, a ia amir araziba dagh ifuegham. Egh ia ingangarir aghuir igharagha garir avɨribar amuam. Egh ia uaghan God gɨfogham, eghtɨ fofozir kam bar mangɨva ekevegham.
